channel.title: Some help please. i need basic help.[resolved]
channel.description:
hi first problem is i have a shop generator and command genartor and spawn genarotor but when i generate the code were do i put it?
-if there is a tut on this please give me a link thanks.[if not im requesting please]
my second is,i have a panel that apears when i trpe ::updates that shows all the updates but i dont no how to add more becuase at the end of them they have a 4 dgit number eg 8124 and i dont no how to add new lines off text becuase of this.
-if there is a tut on this please give me a link thanks.[if not im requesting please]
thats all thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2007, 03:46:39 PM[/size][hr]uhh still need help with this please

item.title: Some help please. i need basic help.[resolved]
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Okay, this:

sendQuest("@whi@26.Nulls Completely gone!", 8172); sendQuest("@red@27.auto restarter every 30 mins to reduce lag.", 8173); sendQuest("@red@27.dds removed due to a glitch.", 8900);
should be this:

sendQuest("@whi@26.Nulls Completely gone!", 8172); sendQuest("@red@27.auto restarter every 30 mins to reduce lag.", 8173); sendQuest("@red@27.dds removed due to a glitch.", 8174);
When you want to add, put the sendQuest(“info, ####”); the #### in your case would be 8175, it goes up 1 number every time. So it’d be 8176, 8177, 8178, 8179, 8180, etc.
And, spawn generator - put the code [if it’s npc spawns] in AutoSpawn.CFG

Read full topic
